attributes.action: represent the UK at the next Eurovision Song Contest, in Russia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fronting a new group, Gordon's 10p Tax Band, and a song about Above and Beyond the Call of Fuel Duty, he might get around the same number of sympathy votes as the recent by-election and lift us off bottom place, in the contest, and possibly the World.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
